name: Space Scavenger (itch) (Hey! I'mEvil)
description:
Control:

_Movement: AWSD (space to speed up)

_number 1 is for gun and number2 is for fixing

_left click to shoot/fix

_esc: pause/resume

You are the spaceship called "Dolphin I" trying to destroy all the meteors that about to hit the space station, but because the space station turn the shield on so you and the space station is constantly draining fuel. Remember to check the fuel tanks 

Yes, another broken pile of messes (TuT ) tried so many new things and get so many bugs
